mapper.select: select g.g_seq, g.g_name, g.g_img, g.g_price, g.consumer_id, g.g_regdate, l.v_machine_pw, l.v_machine_space_no, u.user_id, l.loc_seq from goods_tb g, g_location_tb l, user_tb u where g.loc_seq = l.loc_seq and g.consumer_id = u.user_id and u.user_id = #{user_id} and g.g_status='구매'

select g.g_seq, g.g_name, g.g_img, g.g_price, g.seller_id, g.g_regdate, l.v_machine_pw, l.v_machine_space_no, u.user_id from goods_tb g, g_location_tb l, user_tb u where g.loc_seq = l.loc_seq and seller_id = u.user_id and u.user_id = #{user_id}

select g.g_seq, g.g_name, g.g_img, g.g_price, g.seller_id, g.g_regdate, l.v_machine_pw, l.v_machine_space_no, u.user_id from goods_tb g, g_location_tb l, user_tb u where g.loc_seq = l.loc_seq and g.seller_id = u.user_id and g.seller_id = #{seller_id} and g.g_status = '대기'
